title: UX Developer, Chrome
description: At Google, we follow a simple but vital premise: "Focus on the user and all else will follow." Google’s UX Developers are versatile and passionate about taking on new problems to drive progress and vision for design teams. They’re comfortable wearing many hats and get excited about working across discipline lines to develop products and prototypes that bring new ideas to life.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, related field, or equivalent practical experience. 4 years of experience with front-end development and prototyping.
preferred_qualifications: 5 years of experience developing responsive, adaptive, and performant websites and applications. 5 years of experience as a front-end developer, UX Developer, creative or design technologist, or in a prototyping design environment.
responsibilities: Advise, collaborate with, and synthesize feedback from UX designers and researchers. Collaborate and deliver on final implementation and polish. Meet high accessibility standards. Serve as a mentor for early career UX developers and peers. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and prototype new features that enhance the user experience.
